articles.author: AFP
articles.title: No war between NATO-Russia, Germany won't send fighter jets to Ukraine: Scholz - Hindustan Times
articles.description: German Chancellor Olaf Scholz only just agreed on Wednesday to send 14 Leopard 2 tanks to Ukraine and to allow other European countries to send theirs, after weeks of intense debate and mounting pressure from allies. | World News
articles.content:
Chancellor Olaf Scholz reiterated Sunday that Germany will not send fighter jets to Ukraine, as Kyiv steps up calls for more advanced weapons from the West to help repel Russia's invasion.

articles.title: European Space Agency Shows Off Concept for Martian Sample Picker-Upper - Futurism
articles.description: The European Space Agency has shown off a concept for a giant eight-feet-long robotic arm that is designed to pick up samples of Martian soil.
articles.content:
It's literally picking up where Perseverance left off.
